data.eml:eml: A revision of the South African endemic water beetle genus Pneuminion Perkins (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perkins, Philip D. (2004): A revision of the South African endemic water beetle genus Pneuminion Perkins (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae). Zootaxa 538: 1-38, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157462
